title: Modern house for sale in dodanwala kandy
details:
Modern beautiful 3 bedroom house for sale in dodanwala kandy. Highly residential area
Very close to cinnamon citadel hotel,
Dalada temple 3 km, gatambe 2km, katugastota 4km, multiple road access to Kandy town
Many attractions around with in 1km or less
Easy access to leading super markets and banks

3 bedrooms
2 bathrooms (master bedroom with attached)
1 servant toilet

With 1 vehicle parking

Negotiable
